data.name: One Day in London - Soundtrack & wallpapers: pack 2
data.detailed_description:
Music allows you to deeply feel all the events of the visual novel, and to sample the feelings of its heroes in different situations. Melodies convey the despair of hopeless situations, the confusion when faced with another riddle, and the joy of survival when in mortal danger.

Now you can have all your favorite motifs to keep with you, always!

Download the free collection of high-resolution wallpapers for your desktop and the OST of Chapter Three of the novel. Now you can enjoy listening to the breathtaking music while admiring the cast of One Day in London on your screen!

Tracklist:
1. In the Port of London
2. Thinking of a Simpler Time
3. Safe Place
4. Occult
5. The Scoundrel
6. Opium
7. A Man Without a Name
8. A Walk in the Park
9. Maybe We Can Be Together
10. The Chase
11. Inner Battle
12. Dolor
13. No One
14. Finale
15. Bonus track - Ever Again

data.short_description: Old London’s ambience – the game’s soundtrack and atmospheric wallpapers for your desktop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant
